turkish_example_sentence: Siz o önemli belgeyi almasanız büyük sorun olurdu.
english_example_sentence: If you (plural/formal) were not to take that important document, there would be a big problem.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы вы не взяли тот важный документ, была бы большая проблема.
